org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline

Class LeastSquaresItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline.LeastSquaresItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ItemScorer

    @DefaultProvider(value=LeastSquaresItemScorer.Builder.class)
@Shareable
public class LeastSquaresItemScorer
extends AbstractItemScorer
implements java.io.Serializable
    Baseline scorer using least-squares estimates of preferences, trained by gradient descent.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • score

        public void score(long user,
         MutableSparseVector output)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items to score, and the score method sets the values for each item to its score (or unsets it, if no score can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Specified by:
        score in interface ItemScorer
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        output - The score vector.
